body:
This is great!

Thank you very much for applying the new features in such short notice.

I believe I would need the .ghuser file formats for the two components  (Honeybee_falsecolor and Honeybee_Convert IMG) as I encountered the same discrepancy error between the new ones and the previous versions. Once I replace the previous versions of the component inside the Userobject folder with the latest ones, I would be able to easily load them into my project via the Honeybee tool bar with no error messages.



Thank you indeed,

Alireza
